sections.title: SRE and DevOps Advisory
sections.description: Our SRE experts will carry out assessments and work closely with system administrators, build engineers, application architects, and development leads to understand the current tooling, automation, infrastructure, and observability of your system.
offerings: The team of consultants help you create the tool adoption roadmap in line with the industry best practices to address the pain points.
The SRE experts help you with benchmarking the SLO and SLI.
Set up and implement error budgets and error budget policies.
Our engineers are trained to follow the best practices in SRE.

sections.title: SDLC Automation, Managing Infrastructure and Apps Deployment
sections.description: Our team of expert consultants automate the provisioning of hybrid and multi-cloud infrastructure resources.
offerings: Speed up the application development and delivery by adopting CI/CD.
The SRE experts help you with progressive delivery adoption for cloud native applications.

Our team can you help you with multi-cloud, Kubernetes and other container orchestration technologies with emphasis on configuration management, service discovery, deployment patterns, auto-scaling, and container operation.

sections.title: Observability and Continuous Monitoring
sections.description: SRE experts streamline the monitoring process of cloud-based applications and services.
offerings: Implement health checks across your entire IT infrastructure and application services.
Generate actionable in-depth reports to improve performance.

sections.title: Debugging and Remediation of the Issues
sections.description: We help you setup the process to handle on-call and emergency support while maintaining the operational runbooks.
offerings: Sound Linux/Unix know-how and comprehensive troubleshooting practice.
Conduct detailed post-mortems on production issues.

sections.title: Disaster Recovery
sections.description: Automate the protection of your containerized applications with Kubernetes-optimized cloud native disaster recovery.
offerings: Design Chaos experiments to test the resilience of the production environments.

sections.title: Security, Governance & Cost Optimization
sections.description: Maintain compliance status like the GDPR or PCI DDS while working on the public cloud.
offerings: Conduct security audit to identify and fix the gaps to improve the overall security posture.
Manage capacity with focus on cost analysis, reduced expenses, and cost management.

sections.title: Training for SRE Engineering Best Practices
sections.description: We help you build self-sufficient teams by training them on SRE best practices.
offerings: We enable the teams to understand how SRE related to DevOps and what business benefits come with the use of SRE.
We will be creating training docs and helping build a knowledge base for the SRE practices.
